channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gallery Plugin for WordPress – Envira Photo Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gallery Plugin for WordPress – Envira Photo Gallery

item.title: CVE-2022-2190|2024-08-03T00:32:08.736Z -- unknown -- gallery%20plugin%20for%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20envira%20photo%20gallery
item.description: The Gallery Plugin for WordPress plugin before 1.8.4.7 does not escape the $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] parameter before outputting it back in an attribute, which could lead to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting in old web browsers
